Author: Arthuro711
Title: [ANN][ICO][PCC]First platform for adult services
Body: Would like to update you, that so far we have issues with GOOGLE in the part of approving our ads in their AdWords service. This quite significant influenced our plans in PCC ICO popularization and promotion over internet, as we counted on this method of advertising, through AdWords network.  We complied to all requirements of Google for ads and website itself. You probably noticed that we removed an inoffensive video with a beautiful (dressed up!) model from the title page, and removed links to our live projects (porncorn.video site and mobile application), and made some other changes on the site ... All this was made after phone calls to Google for elimination of issues according to their requirements, in order for Google to approve and allow our advertising of PCC ICO. However, at the end Google have blocked our AdWords accounts without any notice and without any reasons. We repeatedly sent emails to Google requesting to explain which part of website or of our ads is not compliant to their rules, to rectify those issues. And, Google keep silent so far. Now we are looking for alternate ways of our project popularization and promotion.  PS: You also can join our Telegram support group: https://telegram.me/PCCicoOfficial . .

Body: Hello, LieXurui,  We are not keeping ETH at the smart contract address, to protect for the cases of smart contract hacks. As you may know, it was several cases when other ICOs were hacked and ETH stolen. We are keeping ETH at the saving addresses, not at the contract address. . .

Unfortunately, despite 18+ industry have their customers equal to almost 100% of adults population, it is banned too much in the world, as it should be (in our opinion).   P.S. But mission of out PCC (PCORN) project in particular, is to (1) bring new services and new technologies to 18+, and (2) deliver confidentiality, privacy and security in 18+ services by PCC coin and its acceptance widely.    PCC ICO SALE IS OPEN FROM NOW!  Hurry up to buy PCC coins with 50% discount! This huge discount will over on September, 23.  http://image.ibb.co/cOdbOk/0_day.png

Author: Arthuro711
Title: [ANN][ICO][PCC]First platform for adult services
Body: Dear niknik1966,  Sorry, I have to disagree with your opinion.  In our PCORN (PCC) Team we also have member from China. And we are following very precisely to what is happening in China, and know all in quite details from the heart of China.  In very short FYI: China banned ICO because a lot of ICOs was a pure scam! Some Chinese ICOs even had no whitepaper, no team, no any good idea, and even really ugly websites. An lot of people in China invested even in such bullshit-ICOs. Probably this is nature of Chinese people, who like to play and gamble (which is I not saying is bad! ). Later China will come up with formal regulation of ICO processes. The regulation of ICO market we, at PCORN Team, also support, as people get scared from scam-ICOs and normal ICOs even having live products (like we do have) get less chances.  PCC have real team, already have some real live products and have clear and focused roadmap.    PCC ICO SALE IS OPEN FROM NOW!  Hurry up to buy PCC coins with 50% discount! This huge discount will over on September, 23.  http://image.ibb.co/cOdbOk/0_day.png
